about_the_game:
Did you know that Moscow attracts mysterious magical creatures at night?
Going towards the northern lights, they interfere with the city lights and are attracted to the depths of the modern metropolis.

During the day you are a designer: work, communicate with friends, and at night go to the rooftops of Moscow and accompany magical creatures.

Who are these creatures?


Kompots are large magical creatures, and while migrating towards the northern lights, they are distracted by the lights of Moscow. Once lost in Moscow, the creatures can no longer return to their path. Secret design bureaus track their movements and help the creatures get out of the cities.

But is it only the employees of the design bureau who know about the secret of these creatures?

Features:


✦ Recognizable views of Moscow
Familiar locations, many architectural landmarks.



✦ Ordinary life of a designer
Pasha goes to work, drinks coffee, tries to sleep.



✦ Draw posters, tickets, playbills and more, because even wizards need to eat something. Explore the streets of Moscow in search of your "masterpiece" designs.



✦ Magical adventures at night
At night you will go to the roofs of Moscow and undergo stealth missions to save creatures. Beware of prying eyes.
A cozy stealth game in which the game does not punish mistakes, but the most careful ones will be rewarded.



And remember, the main thing is not to forget to pet Shishiga!
